title: Trade Tariffs, Joe Biden & USMCA
itunes:title: Trade Tariffs, Joe Biden & USMCA
description:
Niv Elis, Budget Reporter for the Hill, and Alex Wayne, Bloomberg News White House Editor, discussed USMCA and Joe Biden's campaign.Catherine Trifiletti, Managing Editor at Washington Life Magazine, recaps the White House Correspondents Dinner.Gregory Zamfotis, Founder and CEO of Gregory's Coffee, discusses tariffs and CBD oil.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
